body: So recently, the devs added a feature that stops unfair teams. Well now as of now games can only be 2v2. As this was just recently added, I can see the bugs and stuff with it but I just wanted to let you know. Literally maps right now can only be 2v2. Tbh, I like the feature but if you could fix this, that would be appreciated! Thanks! :)
